Headline: Bus Substitution Between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Shuttle buses replace Blue Line service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Shuttle buses replace rail service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

Trains will run between O’Hare and UIC-Halsted, and between Forest Park and Illinois Medical District.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing construction at the Racine Blue Line station and Morgan substation.

Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore
ShortDescription: NB #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temp rrtd via Inner Lake Shore, West Sheridan, Broadway, Montrose & Marine Dr, near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore, West Sheridan, Broadway, Montrose & Marine Dr, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore
ShortDescription: NB #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore, West Sheridan, Broadway and Clarendon, near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore, West Sheridan, Broadway and Clarendon then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park b Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore
ShortDescription: Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Fremont, Dakin, Broadway and Irving Park, near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Fremont, Dakin, Broadway and Irving Park, due to fire department activity near Irving Park/Inner Lake Shore.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
